question: According to the record from August 15, 1969, how long did it take for the bus carrying the family to depart and finally arrive outside the Red House?
According to the record from July 24, 1975, how long did it take from when the grandparents entered the living room to watch television until the television broke?
According to the record from the early morning of July 25, 1975, how long did it take from when "I" was awakened to when I saw the cat chasing the mouse and eventually the mouse escaping?
According to the record from August 18, 1975, how long did it take from when Karl Larsdal called out "I" to when we lit a fire in the forest at the summit and eventually extinguished it?
According to the record from the evening of August 18, 1975, how long did it take from when everyone started playing soccer on the field until everyone left the field?

According to the record from September 6, 1975, how long did it take from "we" onward, as we moved upward toward the building area, until we reached the edge of the landfill and found someone shooting?
According to the record from September 6, 1975, how long did it take from "I" being questioned by my father at the doorstep of our home until I finally reached the Fina gas station?

According to the record from September 16, 1975, how long passed between the moment Mom came home and told "me" that she'd forgotten to buy a swimming cap, and the moment Dad started making beef burgers in the kitchen?
According to the record from September 16, 1975, how long did it take from when Mom parked the car outside the swimming pool until Mom drove up to pick "us" after swimming practice?

According to the record from September 27, 1975, how long did it take from when Dad started chopping wood in the kitchen garden until the end of his work?
According to the record from September 28, 1975, how long did it take for the "we" family to drive from Vesfjord to the city where their grandparents lived?

According to the record from September 29, 1975, how long did it take from the moment "I" slipped into the basement window to enter the house, to the moment "I" climbed out of the room's window and arrived at the driveway?

According to the record from November 16, 1977, how long did it take from when "we" entered the candy shop until we watched the bus drive away because we missed our ride?

According to the record from November 16, 1977, how long did it take from "I" and Karl Larsdal eating candy at the station to "I" finally returning home and being discovered by my father in the corridor?

According to the record from June 25, 1981, how long did it take from when "I" and Kaisa began kissing deep in the woods until the kiss ended?
According to the record from December 2, 1984, how long did it take from when "I" arrived at the old house in Tveit until I finally left to catch a bus?
From the time "I" returned to the grandparents' apartment for dinner on December 5, 1984, until Dad said he would take "I" away, how long did it take?
According to the record from December 5, 1984, how long did it take from when Dad returned to our city residence to pick up "me," until we finally drove to Sannes' home?

According to the record from July 18, 1998, how long passed from Henrik Inge suggesting a drink in the kitchen to the grandmother finishing her story and exclaiming about the passage of time?

According to the record on July 29, 2008, how long did it take from the time we left the birthday party until we finished our Thai takeaway on the way home?
